content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 02.04.24 were approximately:

  • personnel - about 443 660 (+780) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6998 (+12)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13 350 (+29)
  • artillery systems - 11 112 (+30)
  • RSWW - 1023 (+0)
  • air defense facilities - 744 (0)
  • aircraft - 347 (+0)
  • helicopters - 325 (+0) units,
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8779 (+22)
  • Winged missiles - 2058 (+1)
  • ships /boats - 26 (+0)
  • submarines - 1 (+0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14 783 (+31)
  • Special Technique - 1832 (+6)

Data are clarified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 02.04.24.
title: Minus 780 invaders, 29 BBMs and 30 artistems were destroyed: RF loss per day
author: Army Inform
